alert.note: Alert for Cass; Ransom; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ransom, southeastern Cass and northwestern Richland Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leonard, or 28 miles southwest of Fargo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kindred, Walcott, Leonard and Barrie. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 47 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
